awakenings.effect: Passive skill conditions reduced from 20 layers to 15 layers
Every heal cast by Anubis (even from passives or ultimates) now applies a 5-second buff to the healed ally Incoming damage –10 % , Each new heal refreshes the 5-second duration.
Auto Skill will summon additional meteors for consecutive attacks

effects: Healing amount +50%, each healing gives target +40% attack power for 3 seconds
memoryCard.name: Midnight Work

auto.description: Call a meteor on the target and all enemies within 2 m, 96 % ATK as Chaos damage on impact. adding 1 layer [Nightmare]. [Nightmare]: Every 3 s deals 5.6 % ATK as Chaos damage per stack, Caps at 10 stacks (total 56 % ATK per tick at max).
auto.name: Divine Punishment Rain

normal.description: Deals 120% attack power Chaos damage to designated enemy unit.
normal.name: Underworld Touch

passive.description: When using auto skill (only you) to attack targets with (20) with dupe 1 (15+) layers of DOT, heals entire team self attack power 97.2%+445 HP and Immediately gain one Empowered Ultimate charge, usable within 8 s.
passive.name: Soul Siphon

ultimate.description: Heal lowest-HP ally for 112.8 % ATK(HealerATK) + 668 HP. Enhancement: Heal all allies for 112.8 % ATK + 668 HP and give them 10 % damage reduction for 10 s.
ultimate.name: Destined Reversal

teamSkill.description: Passive: Self attack power +10%. Battle Start: Every 500 attack power increases self healing by 5%, max 6 times.
teamSkill.name: Combination Skill
